sentences.en: At the same time, all this diverse material is unified and made mysteriously figurative.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 所有这些多种多样的质料都得到统一,获得了神秘的形象.

sentences.en: He imprisoned her, in a figurative sense.
sentences.cn: 在比喻的意义上,他把她关在牢里了.

sentences.en: He’s my son, in the figurative sense of the word.
sentences.cn: 打个比方，他就像是我的儿子。

sentences.en: Here the word is used in a figurative sense.
sentences.cn: 这里该字是在比喻的意义上使用的.

sentences.en: His career spanned some 50 years and encompassed both abstract and figurative painting.
sentences.cn: 他的职业生涯延续了大约50年，作品既有抽象画也有写实画。

sentences.en: If not, you are figurative language.
sentences.cn: 如果不合适, 那就它们是具比喻性语言.

sentences.en: It is no less figurative than metaphor.
sentences.cn: 它的修辞性不比隐喻少.

sentences.en: Similar and similarity surplus are a pair of chief categories of figurative thinking.
sentences.cn: 相似和相似剩余是形象思维的一对主要思维范畴.

sentences.en: St. John's eyes, though clear enough a literal sense, a figurative one were difficult to fathom.
sentences.cn: 圣约翰的眼睛, 虽然就表面的意义来说,是够明净的, 可是就比喻的意义来说,却是难以探测的.

sentences.en: The figurative speech used with animal names is an important component part of English rhetoric.
sentences.cn: 分析了英汉语言中动物名称隐喻所具有的特点,产生的原因及它们之间的异同.

sentences.en: The use of charcoal crayon translates in this evolution a less figurative style.
sentences.cn: 在这个演化使用木炭蜡笔翻译不太形象化的风格.

sentences.en: The word here is used in its figurative sense.
sentences.cn: 此词在这儿取的是它的比喻意义.

sentences.en: What is the function of the figurative use of language?
sentences.cn: 语言的比喻用法的功能是什么?

sentences.en: When the meaning in extension is father from the original meaning, it is more figurative.
sentences.cn: 当词义从本义向隐喻方向延伸的时候,离本义越远, 修辞性就越强.

words.tran_cn: 借喻的；具有人的形象的；比喻的
华丽的；有形状的；用图画表现的；有图案的
成形；外形；定形；比喻表达法；图案装饰法
数字；人物；图形；价格；（人的）体形；画像
以图画或图表描绘；设想（figure的过去式和过去分词）
比喻的；修饰丰富的；形容多的

trans.tran_en: a figurative word or phrase is used in a different way from its usual meaning, to give you a particular idea or picture in your mind
